claims_processor.content: Claim denied. Policy exclusion 3.2 applies. Coverage not available for pre-existing conditions. Treatment date: 03/15/2024. Diagnosis: Chronic back pain. Policy effective date: 01/01/2024. Condition documented in medical records prior to policy start.

policy_analyzer.content: Policy exclusion 3.2 states: 'No coverage for conditions documented in medical records within 12 months prior to policy effective date.' Medical records show diagnosis and treatment for chronic back pain on 08/15/2023, 4.5 months before policy start.

appeals_specialist.content: Appeal options available: 1) Internal review within 30 days, 2) External review by independent organization, 3) State insurance department complaint. Success rate for similar appeals: 15-20%. Required documentation: medical records, doctor's letter, treatment history.
